hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.prisonterm.report.PrisonTermSummary( prisonTerm.id, offender.id, offenderName.lastName, offenderName.firstName, offenderName.middleName, offenderName.suffix, offender.offenderNumber, prisonTerm.actionDate, prisonTerm.preSentenceCredits, prisonTerm.sentenceDate, prisonTerm.sentenceTermYears, prisonTerm.sentenceTermDays, prisonTerm.paroleEligibilityDate, prisonTerm.projectedDischargeDate, prisonTerm.maximumDischargeDate, prisonTerm.sentenceToFollow, prisonTerm.comments, prisonTerm.status ) from omis.prisonterm.domain.PrisonTerm as prisonTerm inner join prisonTerm.offender as offender inner join offender.name as offenderName where prisonTerm.offender = :offender order by prisonTerm.actionDate desc

select new omis.prisonterm.report.PrisonTermSummary( prisonTerm.paroleEligibilityDate, prisonTerm.projectedDischargeDate ) from omis.prisonterm.domain.PrisonTerm prisonTerm inner join prisonTerm.offender offender where prisonTerm.offender = :offender and (prisonTerm.verificationUser is not null and prisonTerm.verificationDate is not null) and prisonTerm.status is 'ACTIVE'
